summary: Provides custom AMP argument types that transparently fragment and reassemble arbitrarily large byte strings and Unicode text for transmission, along with utilities for converting collections of strings to and from boxed representations and a simple string-splitting helper.
business_intent: Enable Twisted AMPâ€‘based applications to send and receive very large textual payloads without manual chunking, simplifying serialization, deserialization, and handling of big strings and string lists across the network.
